What is Babi Guling and its role in traditional Balinese ceremony?

Babi Guling is a prized ceremonial food, prepared for The Gods and Goddesses of our beloved island. Tourists flock to Ubud to try this...

For every Odalan at the big village temple, we have to make beautiful towers for the ceremonial procession.
